title: Insider’s Guide to Stock Island
post_content:
A burgeoning Key West destination, Stock Island is teeming with unique Florida culture and a laid-back island sensibility. Venture off the beaten path and explore the hidden gems found within our growing paradise. Read on to learn more about the best things to do on Stock Island during your next visit.

Dine & Drink

Sip and savor the diverse flavors of Stock Island. Offering a wide variety of options able to suit a range of tastes, dig into the best nearby dining just steps from our doors. From our very own Yellowfin Bar and Grill to other local favorites including the Hogfish Bar & Grill, authentic Cuban eatery El Mocho Restaurant, and social hub Lost Kitchen Supper Club, there is no shortage of delectable Stock Island dining.

Discover Cultural Sights

A center for cultural exploration in Key West, Stock Island is home to some of the best local artistic and creative destinations. Pay a visit to Washed Up Key West – a woodworking studio and art showroom – and browse through the beautifully restored and up-cycled furniture and art pieces. Stock Island also houses several art galleries including the COAST artist collective, Koz’s Green World Gallery, and Coconut Row Creations.

Explore the Seas

Take to the water and indulge your sense of adventure on Stock Island. With our own marina on-site, there are plenty of opportunities to explore the seas with ease. Whether you want to spend the morning fishing, the afternoon snorkeling, or the evening out on a sunset boat cruise, enjoy a completely unique Key West experience on Stock Island.
